alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:08PM CST until February 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami, North Clearwater and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami
